Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the town of Cheektowaga
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the town of Cheektowaga, county of Erie.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Cheektowaga; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
